articles.author: Stephen Farrand
articles.title: Giro d'Italia tightens COVID-19 rules after Remco Evenepoel positive - Cyclingnews
articles.description: Masks return to race areas but rider tests not obligatory
articles.content: The Giro d’Italia has tightened the COVID-19 rules for the race after Remco Evenepoel tested positive for the virus, with facemasks now compulsory in such as sign-on, finish lines and anti-doping to … [+2531 chars]
